description: A large and lovable rabbit deals with three tiny bullies, led by a flying squirrel, who are determined to squelch his happiness.
name: Big Buck Bunny

description: The world's first open movie, made entirely with open source graphics software such as Blender, and with all production files freely available to use.
name: Elephant Dream

description: Young Indian fighters are prepared to protect their homeland from a greater threat during the 1971 Indo-Pak war.
name: Border 2

description: The story of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the Indian stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.
name: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story

description: Three friends navigate the grueling UPSC civil services examination while balancing dreams, relationships, and reality.
name: Aspirants

description: A heartwarming story of a middle-class family in small-town India, their everyday struggles and simple joys.
name: Gullak

description: India's first 'Black and White' show captures the struggles of IIT aspirants in Kota, Rajasthan.
name: Kota Factory

description: Four friends quit their corporate jobs to pursue their dream of launching a startup.
name: TVF Pitchers

description: An engineering graduate reluctantly takes up a government job as a Panchayat secretary in a remote village.
name: Panchayat

description: The story of two legendary scientists Vikram Sarabhai and Homi J. Bhabha who built India's space and nuclear programs.
name: Rocket Boys

description: A cute love story set in a coaching center depicting the innocence of teenage romance.
name: Flames

description: A middle-class man secretly working as an intelligence officer for a special cell of the NIA.
name: The Family Man

description: A con artist and a fiery task force officer find themselves entangled in a high-stakes game of counterfeiting.
name: Farzi

description: A link in a chain of unsolved murders leads an honest cop to a tangled web of crime, corruption and danger.
name: Sacred Games

description: A RAW officer's 19-year manhunt for a mastermind behind major terror attacks in India.
name: Special OPS

description: A coming-of-age story following a teenage boy's quest to find a girlfriend.
name: ImMature

description: A shocking incident at a wedding devastates a family and brings them into the orbit of a ruthless criminal empire.
name: Mirzapur

description: Based on the infamous 2012 Delhi gang rape, follows the investigation led by Deputy Commissioner of Police.
name: Delhi Crime

description: A forensic expert and a judicial officer join forces to track a psychopathic serial killer.
name: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side

description: Three friends navigate love, friendship and college life in this light-hearted comedy series.
name: College Romance

description: A suspended inspector gets caught in a web of crime after agreeing to kidnap a young woman.
name: Apharan

description: Two heartbroken strangers meet and slowly develop feelings for each other.
name: Broken But Beautiful

description: A nostalgic look at a middle-class family in the 1990s through the eyes of a 12-year-old.
name: Yeh Meri Family

description: A downtrodden Delhi cop lands a high-profile case and enters the dark realm of Paatal Lok.
name: Paatal Lok

description: A young man navigates life pretending that his uncle is an influential politician.
name: Chacha Vidhayak Hain Humare

description: A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate through daily quirks of modern relationships.
name: Little Things

description: Two wedding planners in Delhi navigate the tricky world of big fat Indian weddings.
name: Made in Heaven

description: A sanitation worker gets the power to see the future and tries to change his destiny.
name: Taaza Khabar

description: A young man becomes the prime suspect in a murder investigation after a night out goes wrong.
name: Criminal Justice

description: A wedding witness to a crime must navigate a deadly game of survival.
name: Undekhi

description: A coming-of-age story about engineering students navigating hostel life.
name: Hostel Daze

description: A behind-the-scenes look at the world of cricket, corruption, and controversies.
name: Inside Edge

description: Medical staff at a government hospital deal with the aftermath of the 2008 Mumbai attacks.
name: Mumbai Diaries 26/11

description: An illiterate housewife is thrust into the world of politics after her husband names her as Chief Minister.
name: Maharani

description: A mother takes over her husband's drug business to protect her family from powerful enemies.
name: Aarya

description: An investigating officer tackles horrifying criminal cases in this crime thriller.
name: Abhay

description: A man takes revenge on those who wronged his family using his clever schemes.
name: Bicchoo Ka Khel

description: The rise and fall of a notorious gangster from Gorakhpur, based on real events.
name: Rangbaaz

description: A classical singer and a pop star from different musical worlds fall for each other.
name: Bandish Bandits

description: A local cop joins forces with a city detective to solve a mysterious murder in the Sirona Hills.
name: Aranyak

description: A quirky murder mystery set in a housing society where everyone is a suspect.
name: Sunflower

description: A father will go to any lengths, including murder, to save his dying son.
name: Breathe

description: A former soldier infiltrates the inner circle of an illegal arms dealer.
name: The Night Manager

description: A murder in a small town leads to investigation of dark secrets and supernatural elements.
name: Candy

description: Young men in Jamtara run a phishing operation that brings them into conflict with police and politicians.
name: Jamtara: Sabka Number Ayega

description: Anthology series of four stories inspired by the works of Satyajit Ray.
name: Ray

description: An IAS officer investigates mysterious events in a village with supernatural connections.
name: Dahan: Raakan Ka Rahasya

description: A historical drama exploring the power dynamics and quest for freedom among courtesans during the colonial era.
name: Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar

description: An action-packed spy thriller featuring agents caught in a global conspiracy.
name: Citadel: Honey Bunny

description: A comedy show featuring Kapil Sharma's humor and celebrity guests.
name: The Great Indian Kapil Show
